name: Farmington – Farm game
description:
Welcome to the vibrant world of Farmington! Here you are the owner of your own farm, who every day enjoys life in nature among colorful landscapes and favorite pets.

Explore and develop new amazing territories, increase your farm. Build different beautiful buildings and factories, creating an entire infrastructure.

Breed adorable domestic animals: cows, sheep, goats, pigs, hens and other birds. Plant gardens with cereals, vegetables and berries, and fill the orchards with beautiful trees. Grow flowers and build roads.

Refine production recipes to improve the quality of your products. Fulfill the orders of your citizens, interact with your neighbors: exchange items and trade products of your farm.

Exciting quests and tasks, funny characters and adventures are waiting for you. Being a farmer has never been so exciting!

GAME FEATURES

SHOP. This is the center of your town. The citizens come here to buy your farm's produce. Sometimes there are queues! You earn in-game coins and experience by selling goods.

CARGO DRONE. Our cute cargo drone visits your farm with orders from other villages. After completing a few simple drone orders, you will receive a reward - a special package that will open after a while. Don't forget to come back for a reward, the drone always brings something valuable!

WORKPLACE. Being a farm manager, you have your own workplace. The Book of Recipes - your biggest pride - is kept here! By increasing your skill and experience, you improve production recipes, and your goods become of higher quality and in demand.

FUNNY TRADE COUNTER. This is a wonderful place on your farm where you can meet your neighbors from other farms and exchange goods and resources with them.

TASK BOARD. New simple tasks appear here every day. That will make your day on a farm productive and fun and receive good rewards for completing them. Also here you will find a daily quest - a time-limited task rewarded with an attractive bonus.

ACHIEVEMENTS. You will get small sparkling achievement medals for every action you take in the game. Collect these medals and get valuable rewards for them, such as in-game coins, decorative elements and other amazing things.

TRUCK. Every day, a cute electric truck will come to your farm. It brings a list of urgent and interesting orders. When you fully load the van with the right products, you will receive a magical gem!

ASSISTANT. This is Danny, your charming personal assistant. Please contact him if you need to find any goods or resources for your farm. Danny will make your life easier and get you any item you are looking for!

FRIENDS AND CLUBS. Play with your Facebook and Game Center friends, make new friends, help each other in the household and earn rewards and bonuses. Join communities - clubs. This will allow you to participate in special weekly events and compete against other clubs. You can search for friends in the game via Facebook.

PRODUCT USAGE DETAILS

Farmington is completely free to play. However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. You can switch off this option in your device settings.

The application will be great to run on your mobile devices and requires an active Internet connection to play. The game uses the social mechanics of the Facebook network.

Farmington supports over 20 languages including English, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Simplified and Traditional Chinese.
